The world

The world should be split up in regions and territories, prototyping each one with a map and showing important features/style of the environment using concept drawings.

This map can be a blueprint or overview using a legend to determine the location of buildings, forests and landmarks(possibly using isolines).


Regions

A natural division of the world describing climate, wildlife and vegetation. Aswell as building style(which depends on natural resources)

Region map

  • Creature areas
  • Climate
  • Plants

Concept drawings

  • Examples of building styles
  • Creatures
  • Plants

Descriptions

  • Climate description
  • Plants description
  • creature behaviour


Territories

A 'political' division of the world, showing town and city locations and describes them.

Territory map

  • Place names
  • Borders

Concept drawings

  • 'Special' areas

Descriptions

  • Quests and NPCs
  • History
  • Towns/Place names
